Text.Page:
We're incredibly grateful for all you've done here, .

In a perfect world, we'd keep you to ourselves, but it would hardly be ethical. They're in dire need at Firespine Outpost, a temporary base built by garrison soldiers retreating from Deathgorge."I'll see what I can do."

Great! Desert runekeepers litter the path to the outpost.

See if you can take some out on the way.

You're the reinforcement from Elenea? Thank you for coming.

We're on our last legs and in need of a serious boost in morale.
